title: Reuters reveals China seeks to stop UN rights chief from releasing Xinjiang report
dc:creator: Ramisa Tasnim
description:
Reuters exclusively revealed that China is asking the United Nations human rights chief to bury a highly anticipated report on […]

The post Reuters reveals China seeks to stop UN rights chief from releasing Xinjiang report appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
Reuters exclusively revealed that China is asking the United Nations human rights chief to bury a highly anticipated report on human rights violations in Xinjiang. United Nations High Commissioner Michelle Bachelet has faced severe criticism from civil society for being too soft on China during a May visit and has since said she will refrain from seeking a second term for personal reasons.

The post Reuters reveals China seeks to stop UN rights chief from releasing Xinjiang report appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
